message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IT, cs.MM 

This paper deals with image restoration problems, which are typically studied in the computer vision (cs.CV) and machine learning (cs.LG) communities. The paper proposes a generic diffusion process for handling multiple Gaussian denoising problems, which involves training a model to learn a regularization term. This falls under the category of artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and information theory (cs.IT). Finally, the paper also discusses the transfer of the trained diffusion term to non-blind deconvolution, which is a topic in multimedia (cs.MM).
